title: It is a Gift
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship

title: Blade of Westernesse
effectText: Use one hit during the Leader re-roll to eliminate one Minion of your choice that is participating in the battle.
conditions: Play if a Hobbit is in the battle

title: Mighty Attack
effectText: Before rolling the dice for your Leader re-roll, forfeit the Leadership of one Companion participating in the battle to automatically change one missed die roll to a hit.
conditions: Play if a Companion is in the battle

title: Servant of the Secret Fire
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if Gandalf is in the battle

title: Andúril
effectText: Before rolling the dice for your Leader re-roll, forfeit Strider's Leadership to automatically change one missed die roll to a hit, or forfeit Aragorn's Leadership to automatically change up to two missed die rolls to hits.
conditions: Play if Strider/Aragorn is in the battle

title: Heroic Death
effectText: Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent's Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may eliminate one of your Leaders to cancel one hit, or eliminate one Companion to cancel a number of hits equal to or less than the Companion's Level.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle

title: Daring Defiance
effectText: Forfeit the Leadership of all the Companions participating in the battle to cancel the Combat card played by the Shadow player.
conditions: Play if a Companion is in the battle

title: Fateful Strike
effectText: If your Leader re-roll scores one hit, additionally eliminate a Nazgûl (if in the battle). If the re-roll scores two or more hits, you can eliminate a Minion (if in the battle) instead of a Nazgûl.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle

title: Sudden Strike
effectText: Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using a number of dice equal to your Leadership (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle

title: Brave Stand
effectText: The Shadow player rolls one die less in his Combat roll for each Companion in the battle (to a minimum of one).
conditions: Play if a Companion is in the battle

title: Ents' Rage
effectText: Add 2 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn or Orthanc

title: Huorn-dark
effectText: The Shadow player rolls a maximum of two dice in his Combat roll.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn or Orthanc

title: Nameless Wood
effectText: If your Combat roll or Leader reroll score at least one hit, score two additional hits.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn or Orthanc

title: One for the Dark Lord
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship

title: Cruel as Death
effectText: Forfeit two points of Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 2 or more

title: They are Terrible
effectText: Forfeit one point of Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.
conditions: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more

title: Dread and Despair
effectText: Before the Combat roll, forfeit one or more points of Nazgûl Leadership. During his Combat roll, the Free Peoples player rolls one Combat die less (to a minimum of one) for every point you have chosen to forfeit.
conditions: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more

title: Foul Stench
effectText: If the Nazgûl Leadership equals or exceeds the total Free Peoples Leadership, the Free Peoples Leader re-roll is cancelled.
conditions: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more

title: Black Breath
effectText: If your Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, you may additionally eliminate one Free Peoples Leader participating in the battle. Alternatively, you can choose to eliminate a Companion in the battle, if the number of hits equals or exceeds the Companion's Level.
conditions: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle

title: Words of Power
effectText: Choose a Companion. That Companion's Leadership and special abilities are cancelled for this Combat round.
conditions: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle

title: Durin's Bane
effectText: Before the Combat Roll, roll an additional attack using three Combat dice; score hits on 4+ and apply the result immediately.
conditions: Play if the defending Army is within two regions of Moria

title: Devilry of Orthanc
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold

title: Daylight
effectText: The Shadow player rolls a maximum of three dice in his Combat roll.

title: Deadly Strife
effectText: Both Armies add 2 to all dice on their Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: No Quarter
effectText: If your Combat roll or Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, score one additional hit.

title: Onslaught
effectText: After removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may inflict and apply up to four additional hits against your units. Roll one die for each hit you inflicted to your units and score one hit against the enemy on each result of 4+.

title: Advantageous Position
effectText: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation. Subtract 1 from all dice on the Combat roll of the Shadow player (an unmodified '6' is still considered a hit for him).
conditions: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation

title: Devilry of Orthanc
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold

title: Advantageous Position
effectText: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation. Subtract 1 from all dice on the Combat roll of the Shadow player (an unmodified '6' is still considered a hit for him).
conditions: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation

title: Relentless Assault
effectText: Before the Combat roll, you may inflict and apply up to two hits against your units. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll for each hit you inflicted.

title: Scouts
effectText: Play if the Free Peoples Army is defending in a field battle. Before the Combat roll, retreat your Army to an adjacent free region or withdraw into a siege.
conditions: Play if the Free Peoples Army is defending in a field battle

title: Devilry of Orthanc
effectText: Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold

title: Shield-wall
effectText: Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent's Combat roll and Leader re-roll, if your opponent scored two or more hits, cancel one hit.

title: Great Host
effectText: If, after removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll your Army units are at least twice as many as the enemy Army units, score one automatic hit.

title: Shield-wall
effectText: Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent's Combat roll and Leader re-roll, if your opponent scored two or more hits, cancel one hit.

title: Mûmakil
effectText: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. If, after the Leader re-roll, you scored more total hits than your opponent (including hits from any Free Peoples pre-Combat attack from a Combat card), score one additional hit.
conditions: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle

title: Confusion
effectText: Every unmodified die result of '1' in the Shadow player's Combat roll scores one hit against the Shadow Army. Any such result cannot be rolled again during the Shadow player's Leader re-roll.

title: Mûmakil
effectText: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. If, after the Leader re-roll, you scored more total hits than your opponent (including hits from any Free Peoples pre-Combat attack from a Combat card), score one additional hit.
conditions: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle

title: Scouts
effectText: Play if the Free Peoples Army is defending in a field battle. Before the Combat roll, retreat your Army to an adjacent free region or withdraw into a siege.
conditions: Play if the Free Peoples Army is defending in a field battle

title: Swarm of Bats
effectText: Cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Free Peoples player. If the Free Peoples player did not play a card, add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: No Quarter
effectText: If your Combat roll or Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, score one additional hit.

title: Deadly Strife
effectText: Both Armies add 2 to all dice on their Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: Sudden Strike
effectText: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using a number of dice equal to your Leadership (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle

title: Relentless Assault
effectText: Before the Combat roll, you may inflict and apply up to two hits against your units. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll for each hit you inflicted.

title: Confusion
effectText: Every unmodified die result of '1' in the Shadow player's Combat roll scores one hit against the Shadow Army. Any such result cannot be rolled again during the Shadow player's Leader re-roll.

title: Swarm of Bats
effectText: Cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Free Peoples player. If the Free Peoples player did not play a card, add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: Charge
effectText: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using only the Free Peoples Elite units (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle

title: We Come to Kill
effectText: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle. After removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, roll an additional attack using only the Shadow Elite units (up to a maximum of five) and score one hit for each result of 5+.
conditions: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle

title: Charge
effectText: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using only the Free Peoples Elite units (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle

title: We Come to Kill
effectText: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle. After removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, roll an additional attack using only the Shadow Elite units (up to a maximum of five) and score one hit for each result of 5+.
conditions: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle

title: Daylight
effectText: The Shadow player rolls a maximum of three dice in his Combat roll.

effectText: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle. After removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, roll an additional attack using only the Shadow Elite units (up to a maximum of five) and score one hit for each result of 5+.
conditions: Play if a Shadow Elite unit is in the battle

title: Deadly Strife

title: Valour
effectText: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.
conditions: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle

title: Desperate Battle
effectText: Both Armies add 1 to all dice on their Combat roll and Leader re-roll.
